SELECT s.school_id, s.school_head, s.school_name, s.school_province, sc.major_name, sc.first_choice, sc.other_choice, sc.special, sc.major_id, y.year, sc.min_score, sc.min_ranking FROM tb_school s JOIN tb_province p ON s.school_id = p.school_id JOIN tb_year y ON p.province_id = y.province_id -- 省份与年份关联 JOIN tb_category c ON y.year_id = c.year_id JOIN tb_batch b ON c.category_id = b.category_id JOIN tb_score sc ON b.batch_id = sc.batch_id WHERE sc.first_choice = #{firstChoice} AND p.province_name = #{province} AND sc.min_ranking between #{ranking} - 7500 and #{ranking} + 10000
order by s.score desc
order by sc.min_score desc
